item.description:
Play Golf with Dad on Fathers Day for the ULTIMATE Gift Idea

Play Golf with Dad on Fathers Day and give the most thoughtful and unique Fathers Day Gift that will be remembered and cherished for a lifetime!

Your Fathers Day Golf Lesson with Dad starts out with a 90-minute Golf Lesson that with help you both improve your Golf Swing, Putting, and Chipping. You will spend time at the Driving Range, Putting Green, and on the Golf Course.

At the conclusion of your Fathers Day Golf Lesson with Dad, you both will be given a certificate for a FREE round of Golfing at Miner Hills Golf Course in Middletown that can be used at any time.

Because each Golf Lesson is customized to the Golfer, the Fathers Day Golf Lesson with Dad is perfect for all levels of Golfers – from New Golfers to the more Experienced Golfer

All Equipment and Fees are included - including Golf Clubs!

Give Dad the perfect Father’s Day Gift that will put a smile on his face and a memory in his heart!

SPACE IS LIMITED * Spots will fill up quickly, so reserve you spot today

Golf with Dad on Fathers Day held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course and Driving Range
80 Miner Hills Dr
Middletown, CT 06457  

Exit 20 off 91 (Country Club Road Exit)

Fathers Day Golf Lesson with Dad is taught by Professional Golf Instructor George Claffey – winner of The United States Golf Teachers Federation Top 100 Certified Golf Teaching Professional in the WORLD – the ONLY Instructor to be awarded this honor in Connecticut!

Tickets are $75 per person at the Golf Course

Advance Ticket Discount – only $60 per person online at www.DiscountGolfCT.com or call (860) 436-9449
item.how_to_find_us: We meet at the clubhouse, our Instructor will be wearing a white www.CTGolfTips.com hat
item.why: Your Fathers Day Golf Lesson with Dad starts out with a 90-minute Golf Lesson that with help you both improve your Golf Swing, Putting, and Chipping. You will spend time at the Driving Range, Putting Green, and on the Golf Course.
